title: ICYMI: DeepSeek Is an Open Source Success Story
author: Joab Jackson
description: Turns out you may not need data centers of specialized hardware to build large AI models, just some good old-fashioned engineering and an open source license. Meta and Nvidia are freaking out.
cntitle: 不容错过：DeepSeek 开源项目成功案例
cndescription: 事实证明，构建大型AI模型可能不需要专门硬件的数据中心，只需要一些良好的工程技术和开源许可证即可。Meta和Nvidia对此感到震惊。
